summary: This bill, the Benton MacKaye National Scenic Trail Feasibility Study Act of 2025, directs the Secretary of Agriculture to study the feasibility of designating the Benton MacKaye Trail as a national scenic trail. The bill highlights the trail's scenic beauty, its economic benefits to rural communities, and its existing maintenance by the Benton MacKaye Trail Association. The study must be completed within one year of the bill's enactment and submitted to Congress. It notes the trail's location in Georgia, Tennessee, and North Carolina.
